sentence.Network_en: This functional, minimalist desk is a direct descendant of the Bauhaus movement.

sentence.Network_en: This design was created by Gerhard Marcks, one of the last representatives of the Bauhaus.
sentence.Network_cn: 奖牌的设计者是包豪斯建筑学派的最后代表人物之一 、 德国人格哈德-玛克斯.
